recipe.title: The Roquette
ingredients: 1 cup (loosely packed) baby arugula plus additional for garnish
Ingredient info: Hendrick's Gin is a Scottish gin infused with cucumber and rose petals. It's available at some specialty foods stores and well-stocked liquor stores.
instructions: Combine 1 cup arugula, agave nectar, and lime juice in cocktail shaker. Using muddler or long-handled wooden spoon, mash until arugula is wilted, at least 1 minute. Add gin. Fill cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Cover and shake briefly to chill. Strain into 2 small rocks glasses filled with ice cubes. Garnish drinks with arugula leaves.
